channel.title: Best PS2 Games Of All Time
channel.description:
Every other forum i go on has this thread, so i thought id start it here. And since over 48 Million PS2 were sold, and still are being sold. Its likely that everyone has one.
Im going to start this off with my favorite PS2 games of all time
10. Time Crisis 2
9. Kingdom Hearts
8. GTA: San Andreas
7. 007: James Bond, Agent Under Fire
6. Burnout Revenge
5. Sly Cooper
4. Metal Gear Solid 3
3. Shadow of the Colossus
2. God of War II
1. Mercenaries
Whats yours?

  8. Grand Theft auto: Vice City
  9. Katamri Damacy
  10. Capcom Vs SNK 2

item.dc:creator: snakedoctor
item.description:
oo7: Everything or Nothing

Socom: Combine Assault(or something like that)

i kicked ass at SC:CA, with my scoped semi automatic M14. I loved how they added vehicles, and managed to do it right! nothing like having an OH SHIT feeling when your sitting there with an assault rifle and a T72 rolls up.

item.title: Best PS2 Games Of All Time
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I only change the skipdraw hack to 4 or 5 when there is constant garbage on screen, turn off some speedhax when they are not needed (less likely to crash) and change the resolution when I want it to look nice.

item.title: Best PS2 Games Of All Time
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Out of interest, do you change any version/settings for other games?

To get GT4 running properly, you have to use a version of the emulator that’s, well, pretty ancient. The latest gives far more errors

item.title: Best PS2 Games Of All Time
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
sersoft:

Well I have a 2.2Ghz Core 2 Duo E4500 and 4GB DDR2 with a 8800GT and I run god of war 1 and 2 full speed 60FPS. With the resolution set to x2.

If a game lags and it says playable, you’re either using an old version of the emulator or you’re using the wrong plugins.

You are a god among mere mortals for posting that picture for me. God of War now runs at a perfect 60 fps. brb canada to blow sersoft

item.title: Best PS2 Games Of All Time
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
CTID:

Well, I have a Core i5-750, 8 GB RAM, and a GeForce 9800 GT, and I can run God of War at like 20 fps.

Well I have a 2.2Ghz Core 2 Duo E4500 and 4GB DDR2 with a 8800GT and I run god of war 1 and 2 full speed 60FPS. With the resolution set to x2.

If a game lags and it says playable, you’re either using an old version of the emulator or you’re using the wrong plugins.

1556×942 235 KB
